page.title: 16INDUSTRY
page.content: It has been stated time and time again about the steel industry in our town and there is more information on ontheir page. However, there are other industries in the town that are also of great importance.Although they are not exactly in the area they contribute to its upkeep. Such industries as BP Chemicals, BOC ( The British Oxygen Company), Tourism. There are innumerous small industries that all help to try and stem the flow of unemployment. Many people feel that the local council have been a bit slack in their approach to tourism. They have not exploited the potential they have along the coast. This inturn affects our area as it could reduces rates.
